metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41041 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Openj9 before version 0.32.0, Java 8 & 11 fail to throw the exception captured during bytecode verification when verification is triggered by a MethodHandle invocation, allowing unverified methods to be invoked using MethodHandles.

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
